lead_paragraph: Three-times Masters winner Nick Faldo, one of the best golfers to emerge from the Northern Hemisphere, has a feeling that a player from south of the equator is likely to triumph this week at Augusta National.

headline.print_headline: Faldo Looks to Southern Hemisphere for Likely Masters Winner
headline.main: Faldo Looks to Southern Hemisphere for Likely Masters Winner

snippet: Three-times Masters winner Nick Faldo, one of the best golfers to emerge from the Northern Hemisphere, has a feeling that a player from south of the equator is likely to triumph this week at Augusta National....
